name: How To Make A Sandwich (Guuzzeji)
description:
"How To Make A Sandwich" is a short hardcore platformer game in which your goal is to collect items to make a sandwich. 

Note: Sorry for the bad audio on the web version, I don't know why the HTML export has bad audio compare to the Windows export. If you can't handle the audio issue, please download the game down below. 

Controls

- "W" to jump

- "A" to move left

- "D" to move right

- "Tab" to zoom in and out 

- "R" to reload from last save point

- "ESC" to pause game
